column5: I find my self pondering the same over and over. I just can’t stand the thought of causing those I love so much pain or leaving my children behind to struggle alone without me in such an unkind world. I daydream of being able to live away from society

I find myself begging for my existence to just cease I’m so tired of the same fight over and over but then I feel incredible remorse for my children and loved ones I would leave behind. I realize I have more than some Yet I’m stuck in limbo most days. I daydream about just disappearing
